Name: Major Whisker Forge
Description: Rising from the pixelated depths of the WebtrES club, Major Whisker Forge is a legend in his own right. This stoic character, known for his cat-like button interface and the sturdy foundry-crafted limbs, is a tactical genius with a love for strategy and forge. His screen displays a classic smile that belies the intricate calculations going on behind it. With an iron hammer in one hand and a spark of creation in the other, Major Whisker Forge spends his days shaping digital destinies and crafting the future of the WebtrES world. Despite his formidable appearance, he holds a soft spot for his fellow pixel comrades and is always ready to lend a robotic arm in times of need.
